devdoc.details: Interface for any contract that wants to support transferAndCall or transferFromAndCall  from ERC1363 token contracts as defined in  https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1363

onTransferReceived(address,address,uint2.details: Any ERC1363 smart contract calls this function on the recipient after a `transfer` or a `transferFrom`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer. Return of other than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted. Note: the token contract address is always the message sender.

params.amount: uint256 The amount of tokens transferred
params.data: bytes Additional data with no specified format
params.operator: address The address which called `transferAndCall` or `transferFromAndCall` function
params.sender: address The address which are token transferred from

devdoc.title: IERC1363Receiver Interface
